article.description: Noah Allen hit five 3-pointers and finished with 30 points, nine rebounds and five assists to lead Hawaii to an 82-61 win over Cal Poly on Saturday night.
article.headline: Hawaii rolls to 82-61 win over Cal Poly
article.linkText: Hawaii rolls to 82-61 win over Cal Poly
article.story: SAN LUIS OBISPO, Calif. -- Noah Allen hit five 3-pointers and finished with 30 points, nine rebounds and five assists to lead Hawaii to an 82-61 win over Cal Poly on Saturday night. Gibson Johnson added 14 points and Jack Purchase had 13 with eight boards for Hawaii, which shot 51 percent from the field and was 13 of 23 from long range to snap a two-game skid. Hawaii (13-13, 7-6 Big West Conference) controlled the boards 42-30 and never trailed. Leading by seven at intermission, the Rainbow Warriors got a pair of free throws from Allen less than five minutes in to go up 54-44 and led by double figures the rest of the way, tying a program record for largest margin of victory in a conference road game. Ridge Shipley paced Cal Poly (8-18, 3-9) with 16 points, Victor Joseph added 15 and Donovan Fields had 14. The Mustangs shot just 38 percent from the field, including 5 of 20 from 3-point range.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
